page.title: 08 RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: I SPEND MY SPARE TIME GOING TO BINGO. AT THE BINGO PRIZES ARE WON AND IT IS IN AID OF DIFFERENT CHARITIES. I AM A MEMBER OF THE SAINT JOHNS AMBULANCE.THERE IS ALSO A SAINT JOHNS AMBULANCE FOR ADULTS TOO. THERE IS A BROWNIES IN CAERSWS - WHICH MY SISTER ATTENDS.THEY MAKE CAKES,TOFFEE APPLES AND MANY OTHER THINGS. ACHIEVEMENTS ARE AWARDED BY THE GIVING OF BADGES. A SPONSORED WALK OF ABOUT 5 MILES IS DONE TO HELP CHRISTIAN AID AND OTHER CHARITIES. THERE IS A JUNIOR/ADULT FOOTBALL CLUB AND A JUNIOR/ADULT TENNIS CLUB IN CAERSWS. A GYMNASTICS CLUB IS HELD AFTER SCHOOL - MANY PRIZES HAVE BEEN WON BY THIS CLUB. **** JULIE ****
